titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 45) to repeal the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and health care-related provisions in the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-59, by Mr. Burgess.
Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 45 with 2 hours of general debate. Motion to recommit with or without instructions allowed. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 24.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 215.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 193 (Roll no. 150).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 192 (Roll no. 151).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/15/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 45) to repeal the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act and health care-related provisions in the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.
